name: ext_R4_MedicinalProductIngredient
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductIngredient for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductIngredient from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductIngredient|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Optional Extensions Element - found in all resources.

element.isModifierReason: If this is present it implies that the whole strength is expressed as a range, due to uncertainty or variation
